name: Rorys Restaurant Origins
description:
Help our sweet Rory in this hidden object game to get through Culinary School! Find cooking ingredients to cook over 30 delicious dishes from all over the world. Fulfill Rory’s dream of owning her own Cafe and purchase items to decorate the Cafe. Let´s get cooking with this perfect mix of different game genres like Hidden Object, Match3, Find the Difference and all sorts of other cooking minigames.

Features:
- HO scenes with different challenges
- Lots of fun minigames
- 3 different playmodes: relaxed, casual and challenge
- Read interesting fun facts about delicious dishes from around the world!
